history.proof: intros Q p q Hreduce Hcanon. induction Hreduce. - inversion Hcanon. shelve. - inversion Hcanon. inversion Hcanon. shelve.

ctx: intros Q p q Hreduce Hcanon.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, b : Term A n nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b p, q, r : list (Term A n) H : inPolySet (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) Q H0 : divP A A0 eqA multA divA n a b H1 : eqP A eqA n (spminusf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a b nZb p q) r Hcanon : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) H2 : olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) H3 : nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) Unable to unify "olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p)" with "canonical A0 eqA ltM r".

ctx: intros Q p q Hreduce Hcanon.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros Q p q Hreduce Hcanon.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, b : Term A n p, q : list (Term A n) Hreduce : reduce Q p q H : eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b Hcanon : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) IHHreduce : canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> canonical A0 eqA ltM q Unable to unify "canonical A0 eqA ltM q" with "canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q)".

ctx: intros Q p q Hreduce Hcanon.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, b : Term A n p, q : list (Term A n) Hreduce : reduce Q p q H : eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b Hcanon : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) IHHreduce : canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> canonical A0 eqA ltM q H0 : olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) H1 : nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) Unable to unify "nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p)" with "canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q)".

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, b : Term A n p, q : list (Term A n) Hreduce : reduce Q p q H : eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b Hcanon : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) IHHreduce : canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> canonical A0 eqA ltM q H0 : olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) H1 : nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) H2 : olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) H3 : nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) Unable to unify "nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p)" with "canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q)".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) (p q : list (Term A n)), reduce Q p q -> canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> canonical A0 eqA ltM q

Premises:

```coq
intros Q p q Hreduce Hcanon. induction Hreduce.
- inversion Hcanon. apply H2.
- apply IHHreduce.
  + assumption.
  + inversion Hcanon. apply H1.
  + inversion Hcanon. apply H3.
```

original: intros Q p q Hreduce Hcanon. induction Hreduce. - inversion Hcanon. apply H2. - apply IHHreduce. + auto. + inversion Hcanon. apply H1. + inversion Hcanon. apply H3.
